resources.string: You need <font color="#ffae00">{amount} Marks of Fortune</font> to purchase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">{product}</font>.
There are {total} reward(s) in this package.
There are {included} reward(s) that match '{filter}' out of {total} reward(s) in this package.
All DLC is available to every character on your account.
All items are account bound (non-tradeable) and non-refundable

All items are account bound (can be used on all of your characters) and cannot be discarded, traded, or sold at the trading post. All items are also non-refundable.\n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font" >Consumable items: </font> These items have limited usage and using one on a specific character depletes the count across the account. For example, if you have five dyes and use one on a character, you will now have four dyes if you log onto a different character under the same account.
This item is an account-wide item (able to use on any of your characters).
This emote doesn't have any description. Please add it!

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/nimbus_bold_italic.font" >Skins</font> are applied to your character and will be applied to any item equipped in the same slot until you change the appearance or remove it.\n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/nimbus_bold_italic.font" >Skins</font> cannot be dyed.

- You must be in a Sanctuary (Settlement, Outpost, Spirit Shrine, or Watchtower) before transferring\n- You cannot belong to a company before transferring\n- You cannot have active trading post buy/sell orders before transferring
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/nimbus_bold_italic.font" >Skins</font> require the base item to be equipped in order to be visible.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/nimbus_bold_italic.font" >Company Crests</font> can only be used if you are the governor (creator) of a company.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/nimbus_bold_italic.font" >Housing Items</font> can only be used after you have unlocked housing and own a house.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/nimbus_bold_italic.font" >Dyes</font> can only be applied on your armor. If the armor is traded or sold the dye will be removed and not returned. You cannot apply dyes on skins.
Displays your 10 most recent store unlocks.
Used to dye parts of clothing and armor.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">EMOTES</font> : You can use an emote in the Emotes menu. Press [{hintText}] to Open Emotes menu.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">ITEM SKINS</font> : You can apply a skin by clicking on your armor and weapons in your inventory and then “Change skin”.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">DYES</font> : You can use a dye by clicking on your armor in your inventory and then “Dye armor".
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">CRESTS</font> : You can apply crests in the Company screen.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">HOUSING ITEMS</font> : You can place housing items in Housing Decoration mode when you are in your house.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font">TITLES</font> : You can apply a title in the Bio tab of the Character menu and then “Change title”.
You can use this currency in the store menu to purchase a product.
You can use this service in Store menu. Select "World transfer" product in Store.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Notice:</font> Company Crests can only be used if you are the governor (creator) of the company.
"Even the mightiest tree cannot withstand your axe." Apparel Skin Set
You cannot perform this action when you are dead.

string.comment: This does not need to be translated. It will be the same in all languages so that we can use the right region regardless of language set.

resources.string: Transaction timed out.\nPlease ensure Steam Overlay is enabled.
Items have been added to your account.
"There are horns for drinking and horns for wearing. One needs both." Armor Skin Set
"With a bite as fearsome as the world serpent's." Hatchet Weapon skin
"Raise a glass to your brave companions!" Company Crest Pack
“Cast out evil with fury and righteous light.” Armor Skin Set
“Leave cursed retribution in your wake.” War Hammer Weapon Skin
"Brimming with awe, the vast expanse of the universe resides within the fur of this rabbit. And if you pet them, you might just feel it too." Celestial Hare House Pet
"Darkness shrouds our most lucrative ventures." Company Crest Pack
We're sorry, the store is down for a bit of maintenance right now. Please try again later.
"A fitting tribute to the beast of slaughter." Great Axe Weapon Skin
“Crafted from the infernal union of human and demon.” Armor Skin Set
"If dead men tell no tales, who will speak of your glory?" Apparel Skin Set
"Strike foes down with divine vengeance." Armor Skin Set
"One last thing before you go… your purse." Apparel Skin Set
"Don the mantle of the mighty cave bear." Armor Skin Set
"Mischief follows the fox." Armor Skin Set
"Formed in the molten-hot forges of the Great Cleave, this avatar of the hatred rises, gold and glittering." Apparel Skin Set
"Tap into the spirit of the animal." Company Crest Pack
"Never reveal your hand until the gold is on the table." Company Crest Pack
"You say so much, when you say nothing at all." Company Crest Pack
"Heave ho, ye scurvy dogs!" Company Crest Pack
"The forest belongs to your merry men." Company Crest Pack
"Blade or bow, axe or musket? The journeyman survives, the master flourishes." Company Crest Pack
"Your treasure fleets will soon be mine." Emote
"Approval, disapproval, withholding judgment." Includes three separate emotes, thumbs up, down, and sideways. Emotes
"The serpents of yore slither eternally with scales of steel." Shield Weapon Skin
“A lance blessed to maintain the balance of light and darkness.” Spear Weapon Skin
“Tormented hellfire crackles within.” Fire Staff Weapon Skin
"When you gamble everything… even your soul." Sword Weapon Skin
“A staff imbued with restorative primordial forces.” Life Staff Weapon Skin
"A scream in the witching hour." Sword Weapon Skin
"Their howl grows ever closer." War Hammer Weapon Skin
"Treacherous waters can yield great treasure." Pirate Housing Decor Set
There is no featured deal at this time.\n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Pica_Regular.font"><font color="#ffffff">B R O W S E S T O R E</font></font>
There is no featured deal at this time.\nBrowse the store using the tabs on the left!
"As if the Corrupted weren't scary enough…" Housing Decor Set
"A canine so faithful they don't require a physical form to be there for you. Plus, no allergies or shedding!" House Pet
"Neither light nor color can escape the deep darkness of its fur. But do you know what can? Love! And this big kitty needs lots of it." House Pet
"Long lost beneath the desert sands, now free to wreak its havoc.“ Great Axe Weapon Skin
"Its kiss giveth life, its sting taketh it away." Life Staff Weapon Skin
"The spark of life descends from the heavens." War Hammer Weapon Skin
"A bite worse than its bark." Musket Weapon Skin
"A fearsome beast, now lost to time, donated the bones that form this insidious blade." Rapier Weapon Skin
"The murky depths shelter remnants of the primordial darkness.“ Void Gauntlet Weapon Skin
"Energy currents run through this piece of facial wear, giving the wearer the apperance of being a little more magical than they really are." Mask Skin
"Even though it's made of wood, this mask makes you think of rock…" Mask Skin
"When fear overtakes the land, his services find high demand.“ Mask Skin
"The mysterious stranger, hardly glimpsed yet never forgotten.“ Mask Skin
"It's easier to hide any spills if you wear red, my friend." Apparel Skin Set
"For a musty relic contained for thousands of years, it doesn't smell as bad as I thought." Apparel Skin Set
"Sinister and sepulchral, armies of bone heed his summons." Apparel Skin Set
"For summoning dogs, companions, or any combination thereof." Emote
"Prostrate thyself before a higher power." Emote
"Strikes with the force of a war horse at full gallop... and also on fire." Fire Staff Weapon Skin
"Power corrupts. The Wicked Tyrant gets you that kind of power." Great Axe Weapon Skin
"Show them your allegiance, brandish it as you fight, smack them in the face with it once in a while if need be. Make it known you are a foe to be feared." Shield Weapon Skin
"A sword for the brave, the refined, the most gallant of our knights." Sword Weapon Skin
"What is true strength? The power to make decisions that govern others? Or simply the force required to kill?" War Hammer Weapon Skin
"None need doubt who their ruler is, lest they feel an icy hand close around their treasonous throat." Ice Gauntlet Weapon Skin
"It is wise to shield one's eyes when gazing upon such resplendent glory." Armor Skin
"If the fool can fooleth the fooled, who is then the fool?" Armor Skin
"The king of the dead is still in every way a king." Armor Skin
Allows you to change the character's name.\nSingle use only.
Allows you to transfer this character to another world that is within the current region.
You are allowed 1 free world transfer on your account. Once claimed, it will no longer be available on other characters.
You cannot belong to a Company before transferring
You cannot have active Trading Post Buy/Sell Orders before transferring
You must be in a Sanctuary (Settlement, Outpost, Spirit Shrine, or Watchtower) before transferring
Your Friends List will be erased and will not carry over
Active Town Project missions will not carry over
Active Faction missions will not carry over
You cannot transfer worlds while in a War.
You cannot transfer worlds while in an Expedition.
You cannot transfer worlds while in an Arena.
You cannot transfer worlds while in a Duel.
You cannot transfer worlds while in Outpost Rush.
You cannot transfer worlds while in queue for Outpost Rush
Confirming Transfer will log you out to the character select main menu.
After purchasing, you will be logged out to the character select main menu.
You can change worlds by logging into your character and accessing the in-game store under "World Transfer".
You can only transfer characters to a different world within the same region. In order to play in a different region, you must create a new character in that region.
You cannot transfer to a world while it is in maintenance.
You cannot belong to a Company or have pending Company invites before transferring.
You cannot have active Trading Post Buy/Sell Orders before transferring.
You must be in a Sanctuary (Settlement, Outpost, Spirit Shrine, or Watchtower) before transferring.
You must first select an eligible world.
You must select a world the character is not in
You are allowed 1 free name change on your account. Once claimed, it will no longer be available on other characters.
"The miscreant ne’er-do-well was happily damned and damnably happy. You’d smile too if you fooled the Devil himself!" Housing Decoration
"Can spot a breach at 10 paces. Maybe he needs glasses…" Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"Lure legendary fish into submission by wielding a pole that resembles their underwater allies." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"With this axe, you can swear the creak of the tree falling almost sounds like a wave cresting." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"Protect your pick from evil spirits today!" Pickaxe Tool Skin
"Some giant bird washed up on shore, not sure what it is, but its talons were damn sharp." Sickle Tool Skin
"Why does it look...hungry?" Skinning Knife Tool Skin
"It's been strengthened from the many breaches it has closed." Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"It uses magic to bob the hook just a little bit. Fish seem to love it." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"Never made an alloy out of azoth, but sure, I'll give it a try." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"It may not look like it, but magic courses through this tool." Pickaxe Tool Skin
"The soft blue glow makes you feel like you really fit in at a magical forest." Sickle Tool Skin
"I ordered a skinning knife from you, not an assassin's knife." Skinning Knife Tool Skin
"Tough enough to handle even the most dangerous breaches." Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"The extra reinforcements mean you'll never need to worry about your pole snapping." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"A tool ought to be cared for, but make it out of the right stuff and you won't have to for a long time." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"Tough enough to mine anything you need in Aeternum." Pickaxe Tool Skin
"Keeping a sharp edge for a long time makes this sickle extremely practical." Sickle Tool Skin
"Tough enough to tear through even Yeti hide." Skinning Knife Tool Skin
"We don't have all eternity... or wait, do we?" Emote
"Water the earth with your tears." Emote
"The resplendent uniform of Death itself, said to stalk every battlefield in Aeternum cursing the island's resurrections." Apparel Skin
"Aeternum holds a crown to the head of each traveler, they need only rise to meet it." Helmet Skin
"Not even the rugged wilderness of Aeternum can keep a royal from looking their best." Helmet Skin
"An arrow notched and released from a bow of superior gold and emeralds wounds egos as well as bodies." Bow Weapon Skin
"The adventurer walks up to the corrupted portal and bangs their scepter on the ground, demanding its vanquishing." Azoth Staff Tool Skin
"From under the water this pole looks as bright and as harmless as the sun above. Fish will soon learn otherwise." Fishing Pole Tool Skin
"In a flourish of blinding light the forest falls before you." Logging Axe Tool Skin
"Commands rock and ore to crumble alike." Pickaxe Tool Skin
"The shimmer of this tool when used in the wild attracts the eyes of many a jealous adventurer." Sickle Tool Skin
"Doubles as a letter opener for your all your regal missives." Skinning Knife Tool Skin
"Royal resplendence fit for the noble-born, either living or Corrupted." Housing Decor Set
"A touch of magic pairs well with any task, including gathering what is needed to survive." Tool Skin Bundle
"Strength of arm can be the best way to render the resources of Aeternum into their constituent natures." Tool Skin Bundle
"A collection of frightful, cursed tools that bore into the user's very psyche for their power." Tool Skin Bundle
"These tools shine so that all may know who wields the power of gold on Aeternum." Tool Skin Bundle
"The cycle of life continues." Apparel Skin
"Don the resplendent uniform of Death itself, said to stalk every battlefield in Aeternum. Get some dark gray dye along with it to remove even more light from the world." Skin and Dye Pack Bundle
